column4: any clues on why the installer insists on downloading ~1000 packages over the net when I have them all on CD and told it not to get updates from the net?
exactly what did you type, UnclaimedBaggage ?
I mean they don't actually enter onto the screen. So if I open up a terminal and type `, nothing shows up in the terminal window
Argghh - found it, many thanks. There's some stupid auto-shortcut feature set up on this PC where menu options become shortcuts if you hold down control. Had done so for Ctrl+Paste
